</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(dollars in thousands, except per share amounts)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(8)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Share Repurchases
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In December 2015, the Company commenced a publicly announced share repurchase program to repurchase up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$10,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of its common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;During December 2015, the Company spent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$169
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to repurchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3,086
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares at a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	weighted-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	average price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$54.79
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Pursuant to the share repurchase program, in 2016, through March 3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	repurchased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	50,068
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at a weighted-average price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$53.52
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, during 2015, pursuant to provisions in the 2001 Plan that allows employees and directors to pay the tax withholding liability upon the lapse of restrictions on restricted stock in either cash and/or delivery of shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock, the Company re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	purchas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3,813
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares at a weighted-average price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$61.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company leases some of the equipment used in its operations under operating leases. Generally, the leases are for periods varying from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years and are renewable at the option of the Company. The Company also has a lease for corporate office space. Total lease and rent expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,307
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,227
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3, respectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. As of December 31, 2015, future minimum payments under operating leases that were either non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;cancelable or subject to significant penalty upon cancellation were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,718
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,242
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2017,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$762
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2018,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$688
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2019,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$377
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for 2020 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$197
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	thereafter.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is party to lawsuits and claims arising in the normal course of business, none of which, in the opinion of management, is expected to have a material adverse effect on the Company&#x2019;s financial condition, results of operations, cash flows or competitive position.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is not contractually committed to any planned capital expenditures until actual orders are placed for equipment or services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Business Segments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has identified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	business segments based on the distinctness of their activities and products: lime and limestone operations and natural gas interests. All operations are in the United States. In evaluating the operating results of the Company&#x2019;s segments, management primarily reviews revenues and gross profit. The Company does not allocate corporate overhead or interest costs to its business segments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Acquisition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	In December 2014, the Company acquired the assets of a trucking company operation in Houston, Texas for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	a cash purchase price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,800
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,700
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	for land and buildings and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,100
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	for trucks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	trailers and other equipment. Acquisition-related costs of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	were expensed in 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	&nbsp;Prior to the purchase, the Company utilized the trucking company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	exclusively to deliver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	to its customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	and slurry facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	, and the land purchased included the site leased for the slurry
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	facility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9.5PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Supplementary Financial Information for Oil and Gas Producing Activities (Unaudited)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s natural gas interests consist of royalty and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;operating working interests in wells drilled on the Company&#x2019;s approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3,800
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	acres of land located in Johnson County, Texas in the Barnett Shale Formation. The Company also has royalty and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;operating working interests in wells drilled from drillsites on the Company&#x2019;s property under a lease covering approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	538
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	acres of land contiguous to the Company&#x2019;s Johnson County, Texas property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Unaudited Oil and Natural Gas Reserve and Standardized Measure Information
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The independent petroleum engineering firm of DeGolyer and MacNaughton has been retained by the Company to estimate its proved natural gas reserves as of December 31, 2015. No events have occurred since December 31, 2015 that would have a material effect on the estimated proved reserves.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The following information is presented with regard to the Company&#x2019;s natural gas reserves, all of which are proved and located in the United States. These rules require inclusion, as a supplement to the basic financial statements, of a standardized measure of discounted future net cash flows relating to proved natural gas reserves. The standardized measure, in management&#x2019;s opinion, should be examined with caution. The basis for these disclosures is the independent petroleum engineers&#x2019; reserve studies, which contain imprecise estimates of quantities and rates of production of reserves. Revision of estimates can have a significant impact on the results. Also, development and production improvement costs in one year may significantly change previous estimates of proved reserves and their valuation. Values of unproved properties and anticipated future price and cost increases or decreases are not considered. Therefore, the standardized measure is not necessarily a &#x201C;best estimate&#x201D; of the fair value of gas properties or of future net cash flows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In calculating the future net cash flows for its royalty and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;operating working interests in the table below as of Decemb
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	er&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, the Company utilized 12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;month average prices of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4.61
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.88
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per MCF of natural gas and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$14.92
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$30.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$29.95
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per BBL of natural gas liquids, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="FIS_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES"></A>

<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;CONTROL
</FONT>
<A NAME="USLM-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM9ACONTROLS_599784">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	S AND PROCEDURES.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Evaluation of disclosure controls and procedures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s management, with the participation of the Company&#x2019;s Chief Executive Officer (&#x201C;CEO&#x201D;) and Chief Financial Officer (&#x201C;CFO&#x201D;), evaluated the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered by this Report. Based on that evaluation, the CEO and CFO concluded that the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures as of the end of the period covered by this Report were effective.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S REPORT ON INTERNAL CONTROL OVER FINANCIAL REPORTING
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The management of the Company is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting. The Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting is a process designed under the supervision of the Company&#x2019;s CEO and CFO to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of the Company&#x2019;s financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Because of its inherent limitations, internal control over financial reporting may not prevent or detect misstatements. All internal control systems, no matter how well designed, have inherent limitations. Therefore, even those systems determined to be effective can provide only reasonable assurance with respect to financial statement preparation and presentation. Additionally, projections of any evaluation of effectiveness to future periods are subject to the risk that controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions or that the degree of compliance with the policies or procedures may deteriorate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, management assessed the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting based on the criteria for effective internal control over financial reporting established in the 2013 &#x201C;Internal Control&#x2014;Integrated Framework,&#x201D; issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (the &#x201C;COSO criteria&#x201D;). Based on the assessment, management determined that the Company maintained effective internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, based on the COSO criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Grant Thornton&nbsp;LLP, the Company&#x2019;s independent registered public accounting firm, has issued an audit report on the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting, which appears elsewhere in this Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Changes in internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;No change in the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting occurred during the Company&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>

<EFX_EXHIBITS>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 15.&nbsp;&nbsp;EXHIBITS AND FINANCIA
</FONT>
<A NAME="USLM-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM15EXHIBITSANDFINANCIAL_38107">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<EFX_AUDITORS_OPINION>
<A NAME="FIS_AUDITORS_OPINION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 80.00%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:94.98%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 4.3PT;">

</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:240.95PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:244.55PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Very truly yours,
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:240.95PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:244.55PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="USLM-20151231EX311DC03F8_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RULE 13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;14(a)/15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;14(a) CERTIFICATION BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, Timothy W. Byrne, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of United States Lime&nbsp;&amp; Minerals,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s ability to record, process, summarize, and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Dated: March&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	/s/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Timothy W. Byrne
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Timothy W. Byrne
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	President and Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 31.2
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RULE 13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;14(a)/15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;14(a) CERTIFICATION BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, M. Michael Owens, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of United States Lime&nbsp;&amp; Minerals,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s ability to record, process, summarize, and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</P>
</TD>

	6
</FONT>

</TD>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="USLM-20151231EX3215EC58B_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 32.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;1350 CERTIFICATION BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, Timothy W. Byrne, Chief Executive Officer of United States Lime&nbsp;&amp; Minerals,&nbsp;Inc. (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), hereby certify that, to my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The information contained in the Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

	4
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:50.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

	Timothy W. Byrne
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;1350 CERTIFICATION BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, M. Michael Owens, Chief Financial Officer of United States Lime&nbsp;&amp; Minerals,&nbsp;Inc. (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), hereby certify that to my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The information contained in the Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">

<A NAME="eolPage73"></A>
<A NAME="USLM-20151231EX95174ABE8_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_95>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_95"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="USLM-20151231EX95174ABE8_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 95.1
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MINE SAFETY DISCLOSURES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The following disclosures are provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;1503(a) of the Dodd
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act and Item&nbsp;104 of SEC Regulation&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K, which requires certain disclosures by companies required to file periodic reports under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, that operate mines regulated under the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mine Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Mine Act has been construed as authorizing MSHA to issue citations and orders pursuant to the legal doctrine of strict liability, or liability without fault. If, in the opinion of an MSHA inspector, a condition that violates the Mine Act or regulations promulgated pursuant to it exists, then a citation or order will be issued regardless of whether the operator had any knowledge of, or fault in, the existence of that condition. Many of the Mine Act standards include one or more subjective elements, so that issuance of a citation or order often depends on the opinions or experience of the MSHA inspector involved, and the frequency and severity of citations and orders will vary from inspector to inspector.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Whenever MSHA believes that a violation of the Mine Act, any health or safety standard, or any regulation has occurred, it may issue a citation or order which describes the violation and fixes a time within which the operator must abate the violation. In some situations, such as when MSHA believes that conditions pose a hazard to miners, MSHA may issue an order requiring cessation of operations, or removal of miners from the area of the mine, affected by the condition until the hazards are corrected. Whenever MSHA issues a citation or order, it has authority to propose a civil penalty or fine, as a result of the violation, that the operator is ordered to pay.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The table that follows reflects citations, orders, violations and proposed assessments issued to the Company by MSHA during the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and all pending legal actions as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Due to timing and other factors, the data may not agree with the mine data retrieval system maintained by MSHA. The proposed assessments for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were taken from the MSHA system as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of March&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additional information follows about MSHA references used in the table:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;104(a) Citations:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The total number of citations received from MSHA under section&nbsp;104(a) of the Mine Act for alleged violations of health or safety standards that could significantly and substantially contribute to a serious injury if left unabated.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;104(b) Orders:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The total number of orders issued by MSHA under section&nbsp;104(b) of the Mine Act, which represents a failure to abate a citation under section&nbsp;104(a) within the period of time prescribed by MSHA. This results in an order of immediate withdrawal from the area of the mine affected by the condition until MSHA determines that the violation has been abated.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;104(d) Citations and Orders:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The total number of citations and orders issued by MSHA under section&nbsp;104(d) of the Mine Act for unwarrantable failure to comply with mandatory health or safety standards.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;110(b)(2) Violations:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The total number of flagrant violations issued by MSHA under section&nbsp;110(b)(2) of the Mine Act.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 17.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:1PT;WIDTH:1PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;107(a) Orders:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The total number of orders issued by MSHA under section&nbsp;107(a) of the Mine Act for situations in which MSHA determined an imminent danger existed.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Citations and orders can be contested before the Federal Mine Safety and Health Review Commission (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Commission
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), and as part of that process, are often reduced in severity and amount, and are sometimes dismissed. The Commission is an independent adjudicative agency that provides administrative trial and appellate review of legal disputes arising under the Mine Act. These cases may involve, among other questions, challenges by operators to citations, orders and penalties they have received from MSHA, or complaints of discrimination by miners under section&nbsp;105 of the Mine Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	(1)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The definition of a mine under section&nbsp;3 of the Mine Act includes the mine, as well as other items used in, or to be used in, or resulting from, the work of extracting and processing limestone, such as roads, land, structures, facilities, equipment, machines, tools, kilns, and other property. These other items associated with a single mine have been aggregated in the totals for that mine.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Includes any pending legal action before the Commission involving such mine as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Any pending legal actions were initiated by the Company and may include multiple citations or orders. The pending legal actions may relate to the citations or orders issued by MSHA during the reporting period or to citations or orders issued in prior periods. The aggregate number of legal actions instituted and the aggregate number of legal actions resolved during the reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	period were 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pattern or Potential Pattern of Violations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;During the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, none of the mines operated by the Company received written notice from MSHA of either (a)&nbsp;a pattern of violations of mandatory health or safety standards that are of such nature as could have significantly and substantially contributed to mine health or safety hazards under section&nbsp;104(e) of the Mine Act or (b)&nbsp;the potential to have such a pattern.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
